title: Gran
body:
Gran: hey     
<<if $talked_to_gran is false>>    
    
    You: why?
    <<set $talked_to_gran to true>>
    
<<elseif $talked_to_gran is true>>
    Gran: Why are you still here
<<endif>>


<<if not visited("Gran.Watch")>>
[[Seen any monsters?|Gran.Monsters]]
<<endif>>
[[See you later.|Gran.Exit]]
